name: FOR YOUR MALICE (TWO TONE COLORS)
description:
-TWO TONE COLORS VERSION-
The title For Your Malice comes from a song from As The Palaces Burn album tracklist by Lamb Of God.
Actually this image has nothing to do with the song and not intended to interpret the song from Lamb of God. This image is a collection of several objects that are not related at all but are drawn using pointillism or dotting techniques.
It takes 3 weeks to finished the artwork dot by dot, using adobe illustrator (manually dotted but using digital equipment) and colored with adobe photoshop.

3200 x 3200 px
